    • LanguageFile

      public LanguageFile(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin, File langFolder, String resourceDirectory, String langName)
      The LanguageFile function is used to create a new LanguageFile object.
      Parameters:
      plugin - Get the plugin's name and version
      langFolder - Get the path to the language folder
      resourceDirectory - Specify the directory in which the language file is located
      langName - Set the name of the language file
